title: A major harmonic dictation - authentic cadence

content.question:
Before listening to the first playing, please look at the staff below. Notice that there are nine chords in the progression; the soprano and bass notes and the Roman numeral of the first chord are given. Now listen to the progression for the first time and begin working.

The progression for Question 3 will now be played a second time.

The progression for Question 3 will now be played a third time.

The progression for Question 3 will now be played a final time.

unit.text: 3: Music Fundamentals III - Triads and Seventh Chords

skill.text: Skill 3.B: Notate the soprano and bass pitches of a performed harmonic progression in a major or minor key (may include chromatically altered pitches).
